title.rendered: Adenuga, Mike Adenuga Foundation, donates 1.5 Billion Naira to fight Covid-19

content.rendered:
On behalf of the Mike Adenuga Foundation (MAF), Mrs. Disu visited the Executive Governor of Lagos, Mr. Babajide Sanwo-Olu to deliver the sum of N500 million to support the states fight against the global Coronavirus pandemic, otherwise known as COVID-19.

Bella’s father, Dr. Mike Adenuga through his foundation is committed to the wellbeing of Nigerian citizens, especially at this time when the country grapples to contain the Coronavirus pandemic. He commends the efforts being made by the government, individuals and organizations to tackle the challenge.

MAF has contributed N1 Billion to the Central Bank of Nigeria and will continue its on-going effort to assist various bodies and institutions in the country with essential requirements to combat the pandemic.
